name: Invaders of Yekithar
description:
I made this game a long time ago for ludum dare 38. You can see the original ludum dare listing here. 

How To Do:

  • X to “insert coin” (only press once)
  • 1,2,3 to change window size
  • 0 to toggle fullscreen
  • r resets to title
  • <-, ->, x, c to play

Tools:

  • GameMaker: Studio
  • LMMS
  • sfxr
